taskbody.context: When editing the Triple'A Plus XML file, you might want to validate them against their XSD schema. To do so:

step.cmd: Create a General Project / Create a Java Project.
Import the Triple'A Plus XML file into the project.

taskbody.result: The XML file is validated against its XSD.

postreq.p: If you are setting the External server runtime preference only after you have created the project, you need to reload the dependencies by clicking .
